name: timing
description: Convert timestamps from/to various formats and preview/insert them on demand.

timing.epochConversionBoundaries.title: The epoch conversion boundaries.
timing.epochConversionBoundaries.description: The conversion boundaries to distinguish when to consider an epoch timestamp's unit as "seconds", "milliseconds", "microseconds" or "nanoseconds".

seconds.title: Conversion boundary for epoch seconds.
seconds.description: Define the digit count to consider an epoch timestamp as seconds.

min.title: Minimum digit count.
min.description: Minimum digit count to consider an epoch timestamp as seconds.

max.title: Maximum digit count.
max.description: Maximum digit count to consider an epoch timestamp as seconds.

milliseconds.title: Conversion boundary for epoch milliseconds.
milliseconds.description: Define the digit count to consider an epoch timestamp as milliseconds.

min.title: Minimum digit count.
min.description: Minimum digit count to consider an epoch timestamp as milliseconds.

max.title: Maximum digit count.
max.description: Maximum digit count to consider an epoch timestamp as milliseconds.

microseconds.title: Conversion boundary for epoch microseconds.
microseconds.description: Define the digit count to consider an epoch timestamp as microseconds.

min.title: Minimum digit count.
min.description: Minimum digit count to consider an epoch timestamp as microseconds.

max.title: Maximum digit count.
max.description: Maximum digit count to consider an epoch timestamp as microseconds.

nanoseconds.title: Conversion boundary for epoch nanoseconds.
nanoseconds.description: Define the digit count to consider an epoch timestamp as nanoseconds.

min.title: Minimum digit count.
min.description: Minimum digit count to consider an epoch timestamp as nanoseconds.

max.title: Maximum digit count.
max.description: Maximum digit count to consider an epoch timestamp as nanoseconds.

timing.clipboard.readingEnabled.title: Read input time from the clipboard.
timing.clipboard.readingEnabled.description: Indicates whether the extension should try to get the input time from the clipboard instead of asking the user for input.

timing.clipboard.writingEnabled.title: Write the converted time to the clipboard
timing.clipboard.writingEnabled.description: Indicates whether the result of the conversion is written to the clipboard. When enabled, no result view is shown.

timing.customFormats.title: Custom time formats.
timing.customFormats.description: An array of custom source/target formats used to convert from/to.

items.title: Custom time formats.
items.description: Custom time format to convert from/to.

format.title: The custom time format.
format.description: A custom momentjs format to convert a time from/to.

description.title: The description.
description.description: The description of the format. Used as quick pick description.

detail.title: The detail.
detail.description: The detail of the format. Used as quick pick detail.

timing.insertConvertedTime.title: Insert the converted time.
timing.insertConvertedTime.description: Indicates whether a converted time is inserted at the cursor's current position after conversion. When enabled, no result view is shown.

timing.ignoreFocusOut.title: Ignore when input box loses focus
timing.ignoreFocusOut.description: Indicates whether the input boxes remain visible when the focus is lost.

timing.hiddenCommands.title: Hide Commands from the command palette.
timing.hiddenCommands.description: Add all command IDs here that shall not be shown in the command palette.

oneOf.deprecationMessage: The string format of this property is DEPRECATED. Please convert the command IDs to an array instead.
oneOf.title: The commands to hide.
oneOf.description: Comma separated string of command IDs

items.title: The command to be hidden
items.description: The command ID that shall be hidden.

timing.hideResultViewOnEnter.title: Hide the result view when enter is pressed.
timing.hideResultViewOnEnter.description: Indicates whether the result view is hidden when enter is pressed. When set to "false" the command will restart.

timing.hoverDuration.sourceUnit.title: The epoch unit of the duration hover preview.
timing.hoverDuration.sourceUnit.description: Indicates the source epoch unit for the duration hover preview.

timing.hoverDuration.enabled.title: En-/disable the duration hover.
timing.hoverDuration.enabled.description: Controls whether the duration hover is enabled or disabled.

timing.hoverDuration.useISOTargetFormat.title: Use the ISO 8601 duration representation as target format.
timing.hoverDuration.useISOTargetFormat.description: Indicates whether the ISO 8601 duration definition is used as target format.

timing.hoverTimestamp.enabled.title: En-/disable the timestamp hover.
timing.hoverTimestamp.enabled.description: Controls whether the timestamp hover is enabled or disabled.

timing.hoverTimestamp.targetFormat.title: The target format of the hover preview.
timing.hoverTimestamp.targetFormat.description: Indicates the target format of the hover preview. It can be either "utc", "local" or a custom format. Use an object to specify further options for custom formats.

oneOf.title: The format of the hover preview.
Custom Format.
oneOf.description: Use an object to specify further options for custom formats.

name.title: The name of the format.
name.description: Shown as prefix in the hover preview.

localize.title: Localize the format.
localize.deprecationMessage: The "localize" property has been DEPRECATED. Use the "timezone" property instead.
localize.description: Indicates whether the custom format shall be localized.

timezone.title: The target timezone
timezone.description: Specify which target timezone shall be used for the time conversion.
